title: All-in-one hybrid atmospheric water harvesting for all-day water production by natural sunlight and radiative cooling
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE04363K, Paper
Jiaxing Xu, Xiangyan Huo, Taisen Yan, Pengfei Wang, Zhaoyuan Bai, Jingwei Chao, Ronggui Yang, Ruzhu Wang, Tingxian Li
A compact hybrid atmospheric water harvesting device for all-day water production by synergistically harvesting energy from natural sunlight and the cold universe.
